properties.description:
We will always run as incremental. In the first run, it will load the whole table and write the last record loaded in watermark table. The next time you load will be really incremental.

- For incremental load use:
Parameter tables = ["{'schema': 'BD_BASI', 'table':'TB_TELEFONE','load_type':'incremental','partition_column':'null','control_column':'DT_ATUALIZACAO','control_column_type_2_db':'datetime', 'control_column_default_value': '19000101000000', 'control_column_mask_value': 'DD/MM/YYHH24:MI:SSFF', 'columns': 'NR_TELEFONE,NR_DDD,CD_PESSOA,PAI_SG,DT_ATUALIZACAO,FL_TIPO_COMUNICACAO,CD_TIPO_TELEFONE,CD_TELEFONE,CD_TIPO_USO_TELEFONE,NR_RAMAL,FL_ESTRANGEIRO,DS_ORIGEM,NR_TELEFONE_SCOP,NR_DDI'}"]
Execute pipeline = template_import_table_incremental

This objetc is ~150MB in size. You can user coalesce(2) for partitions to be about 128MB in size.

activities.name: raw_load_bdo_unified__0__switch_env
activities.description: Run template pipeline to import tables
